title: Jacket, early 20th century
medium:
Medium: wool, silk, cotton
Technique: woven, embroidered
description: Short jacket of black wool solidly covered in geometric decoration, largely embroidered, in bright wool of red, orange, green, bright blue, and white. The jacket is comprised of perpendicular panels that are divided by bands of orange embroidery. The coat has been re-cut to fit the donor. Lined with red silk over original lining of cotton.

tombstone.epitaph:
Jacket, early 20th century.Medium: wool, silk, cotton
Technique: woven, embroidered. 1949-21-1.
